response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense worth to me. I believe its true value exceeds expectations and I am eager to share it with someone who appreciates its significance.

I am offering this product to you for $2,000,000. This generous offer reflects my confidence in its exceptional quality and the potential it holds for you. I understand that the value of such an item might be subjective, but I am certain that you will find its worth far beyond the sum offered.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you are interested in discussing the details further or have any questions, I would be more than happy to provide additional information. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
